https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Testing

Formal process is defined:
https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Software-Development-Life-Cycle

Testing related chapters:
- https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Software-Development-Life-Cycle#defining - plan how to test particular change is defined
- https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Software-Development-Life-Cycle#implementation - unit testing, integration testing and static code analisis is always performed in this phase
- https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Software-Development-Life-Cycle#testing - additional functional/system tests are performed in this phase
tests_are_added_justification:
Test policy:
https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Testing

Evidence will be provided in the testing task as described in https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Software-Development-Life-Cycle#testing
tests_documented_added_justification:
The entire process is described in https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Software-Development-Life-Cycle
It also contain information on which stage each type of tests is created and executed.

Specific information about testing are also defined in https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Testing
warnings_justification:
Advanced static code analysis (linters checking) is performed automatically against the project.
CI workflow and results: https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/actions/workflows/ci.yml
warnings_fixed_justification: All warnings are addressed. Otherwise it blocks from delivering new changes.
warnings_strict_justification:
Very strict rules are used and defined in:
https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/blob/main/tests/prospector_profile.yaml
know_secure_design_justification: The autor (https://www.linkedin.com/in/maciej-dabrowski-test-engineer/) is considered certified security developer (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OjUeA8SG__AFe65BrNYCsZ678VZV8Xuk/view?usp=sharing).
know_common_errors_justification: The autor (https://www.linkedin.com/in/maciej-dabrowski-test-engineer/) has strong Automotive experience (over 6 years of experience in testing Automotive software/systems) and knowledge how to test and protect against these kind of problems.

https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/wiki/Testing#static-code-analysis

It is performed on every commit as configured in https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/blob/main/.github/workflows/ci.yml
with security scans perfomred daily: https://github.com/mdabrowski1990/uds/blob/main/.github/workflows/codeql-analysis.yml
